hasten.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make something happen faster or sooner
hasten.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Their departure was hastened by an abnormally cold winter.
hasten.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to do or say something quickly or without delay
hasten.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I hastened to assure her that there was no danger.
